title: SparklingWatermelonPunch
recipe: With 1 large spoon or ice cream scoop, carve out the insides of half a mini watermelon and set aside.
Add the watermelon chunks and mint leaves to a blender, and puree until smooth.
Fine-strain the puree to remove pulp and add the juice (about 1 cup) to a separate container.
In the carved watermelon half, add cubed ice, vodka, lime juice, simple syrup and 5 oz watermelon juice.
Garnish with lime wheels and a mint sprig.
